### Project Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites qualified Design-Build (DB) contractors to deliver a water pumping station and reservoir at Saskatchewan Penitentiary, Prince Albert, Saskatchewan for Correctional Service Canada (CSC). The project includes designing and building a new water supply system, including a potable water reservoir and distribution infrastructure to replace the existing facilities.

### Project Requirements

* Provide a reliable and safe potable water supply and emergency water for firefighting purposes to serve the Saskatchewan Penitentiary.
* Design and build a new pumphouse, potable water reservoir, and distribution infrastructure.
* Safely shut down and disconnect the existing pumphouse and reservoir following completion and full commissioning of the new system.

### Evaluation Criteria

The project will be evaluated based on the accumulated scores of technical merit and price.
